attributes.action: Return to a.m. delivering time of mail - instead of receiving it at 12 noon and after.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The british public should receive their mail at a much earlier time slot, rather than getting it at 12 noon or after.

The service has gone worse since this has happened. I much preferred it when i used to receive my mail at 8am and 9am etc..
